messageBody:
On 3/27/07, roman.kitko <roman.kitko@...> wrote:
>
> I would like to filter Tests using anotations on method or class level
> of test class.
> For example :
> @TestAttribute(testType=TestType.INTEGRATION)
> @...
> public void testDDLAndDropRestrictStmt()...
>
> Junit4 designs filtering using Filter class and Description class.
> Problem is Description class provides only formated display name of
> test and I must parse it to resolve class and method, this I do not like.
>
> I do not want to subclass Description class and Runner and add new
> fields to Description class, this is not good design.
>
> What are my possibilities, is not there plan to add class and method
> to Description class?
>

These feature tend to go beyond unit testing, and I think TestNG may
help you there (http://testng.org) with support for groupings, group
dependencies and annotation transformers (invoked for each test
related method).

./alex
